participant_id.Description: Unique participant ID formated as sub-XX

ParticipantID.Description: Unique participant ID formated as XX

Age.Description: Age at the time of the first recording

Sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

HandLateralization.Description: Handedness of the participant assessed by the Waterloo Handedness Questionnaire

FootLateralization.Description: Footedness of the participant assessed by the Waterloo Footedness Questionnaire

Pain.Description: Presence of phantom limb pain in the amputate limb

Levels.Quadruple: Both sides, upper and lower limb
